translations: · Both of my grandfathers have passed away.
我的两位祖父都已去世。

sentences.sentence: Our grandfathers ancestored some of the well-known families in Beijing.
sentences.translation: 我们的祖父辈是北京几家望族的祖先。

sentences.sentence: Both his grandfathers were miners who had to retire from work through injury.
sentences.translation: 他的祖父和外祖父都是矿工，他们因伤不得不从工作中退下来。

sentences.sentence: Our streets are actually not as safe as they were in the days of our grandfathers.
sentences.translation: 我们的街道不再像我们的祖父那个时代一样安全了。
